nodes.title: Cross-Buy for Yupitergrad on Oculus Quest and Oculus Rift is available now!
nodes.body_text:
Dear komrades, players, friends!

We are pleased to inform you that we implemented Cross-Buy  for Yupitergrad. This means that you need to purchase the game only once to play it both Oculus Quest and Oculus Rift.

We are very excited to announce it - as a studio, we are committed to deliver the most complete product possible. Moreover, we implement as many user-friendly solutions as possible, reading your request on social media channels and our Discord channel. Sometimes it takes us some time, but your feedback is always very important to us.

We wish all the owners of Quests and Rifts a lot of fun with the game :)

We would also like to remind you that you can always leave new suggestions or just talk to us and other players on GameDust Discord. There is a friendly atmosphere full of space flights and crazy acrobatics - everyone is welcome :)

Stay safe komrades!

nodes.title: Update 1.2 for Yupitergrad is out now!

node.reviewDescription:
Swinging by a cable attached to each arm, you must make your way through a beautifully designed Jupiter spacestation.

Plenty of large rooms to swing around, plenty of corridors to use your 2 lines to correct your swing path.

Puzzles, hidden routes, deadly obstacles, moving targets for the suction cup cables. Very fun. 

Lasts quite awhile, it's a big station. And after you finish the game there are tons of time challenges for swinging through specially created courses. And they add new ones in updates.

An extremely fun game, especially once you figure out that whole arm pulls will whiz you upwards! Very intuitive, very Spiderman.

website_page_meta.description: Yupitergrad is the plunger-driven kosmonaut game where you can swing through space station with style all in cell-shaded graphics. Can you believe that grappling hooks is the definitive way of locomotion in place like this? It's one of a kind experience, where VR platformer meets puzzles in a single player campaign. It also gives you arcade thrills with Time Attack mode. All of this is soaked in delicious dieselpunk sauce.
website_page_meta.title: Yupitergrad · Oculus Quest
